p.k: Marc introduces a hearty kushiage bento and Maki demonstrates how to make a delicious wasabi chicken bento. Bento Trip showcases a vegetable-packed kamameshi bento from Kobuchisawa in Yamanashi.
p.d: Content on-the-go! Diverse, innovative, immersive and smartphone optimized. Topics range from arts, crafts and ninjas to international celebrities!
